details.description: Search for lorry and bus operators on the Vehicle and Operator Services Agency (VOSA) website
details.more_information:
You can search by:

- type of licence
- town or postcode
- operator or trading name
- the person named on the licence
- operator licence number

If you need help, contact the VOSA helpline.

$C
**VOSA helpline**  
0300 123 9000
$C

*[VOSA]: Vehicle and Operator Services Agency
details.introduction: The Vehicle and Operator Services Agency (VOSA) operator search lets you find all heavy goods vehicle (HGV) and public service vehicle (PSV) operators with at least one operator's licence.

details.description: Includes setting up test stations, employing drivers and becoming a vehicle operator

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
